headline: EchoStar Corporation (SATS): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on EchoStar Corporation on Century Egg Credit’s Substack by Century Egg. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on SATS. EchoStar Corporation’s share was trading at $61.79 as of August 29th. SATS’s forward P/E was 69.93 according to Yahoo Finance. EchoStar (SATS) has taken a pivotal step by announcing […]

headline: AT&T-EchoStar spectrum purchase
summary: AT&T and EchoStar announced an agreement for AT&T to acquire 30 MHz of nationwide 3.45 GHz mid-band spectrum and 20 MHz of nationwide 600 MHz low-band spectrum for $23bn, with licenses covering over 400 markets across the US.

raw.headline: AT&T-EchoStar spectrum purchase
